quiz.question: What is the primary purpose of the W01 Activity: Team Project Setup?
options: To complete the entire project individually
To set up the team project asynchronously using the required tools and technology
To submit the final project for grading
To create a new project unrelated to the course
quiz.explanation: The purpose of the W01 Activity is to set up the team project asynchronously using the required course tools and technology.

quiz.question: What is the name of the course's learning project mentioned in the W01 Activity?
quiz.explanation: The course's learning project is called 'Sleep Outside,' as mentioned in the instructions.
